'''Alerie Tyrell''', nĂŠe '''Hightower''', is an unseen character in ''[[Game of Thrones]]''.
sections.In the books: In ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'', her family remains the same, except she and Mace have two other sons, named Willas and Garlan. She is described as tall and dignified and has long silver hair. She is younger than her husband.
sections.Biography:
===Background===
Alerie Tyrell is a daughter of [[House Hightower]]. She is the wife of [[Mace Tyrell]], the [[Lord of Highgarden]] and the head of [[House Tyrell]]. They have two children,Â [[Loras Tyrell|Loras]] andÂ [[Margaery Tyrell|Margaery]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/#!/guide/houses/tyrell/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 guide to houses, House Tyrell entry]</ref><ref name="House Tyrell viewers guide">[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season2/#!/guide/houses/tyrell/ HBO viewers guide, season 2 guide to houses, House Tyrell entry]</ref>
